title: HACKED AND PASSWORD CHANGED.
body: i have been using the support page but really not getting anywhere,. I really want my account back it has all the champs and skins i got gifted and its very upsetting. They have changed the password and email and also keep playing on my account. They have created 2 masteries as well. This support page is not helping and getting anywhere.  Please help me get account back.

replies.body: Have you tried sending a ticket to riot?
